meta.title: Chefriends — Your AI Chef Friends
meta.description: Snap your fridge, pick a chef friend, and get personalized recipes from 8 AI chefs specialized in cuisines from around the world. Step-by-step cooking guidance, shopping lists, and more.
hero.subtitle: Snap your fridge, pick a chef, and cook something amazing. 8 AI chefs, each specialized in a different cuisine, guide you step by step.
hero.phone.subtitle: Tell us what's in your kitchen
features.label: Features
features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: From ingredient scanning to step-by-step guidance, Chefriends makes cooking feel like having a friend in the kitchen.
features.scanFridge.title: Scan Your Fridge
features.scanFridge.description: Snap a photo of your fridge or ingredients and our AI instantly identifies what you have. No typing needed.
features.chefFriends.title: 8 Chef Friends
features.chefFriends.description: From Italian to Thai, Brazilian to Spanish. Each AI chef is specialized in their cuisine with authentic techniques and recipes.
features.stepByStep.title: Step-by-Step Cooking
features.stepByStep.description: Swipe through clear instructions with chef tips at each step. Adjust servings and the recipe scales automatically.
features.shoppingLists.title: Smart Shopping Lists
features.shoppingLists.description: Missing ingredients are automatically detected and saved to a checklist you can take to the store.
features.personalized.title: Personalized Recipes
features.personalized.description: Set dietary preferences, time constraints, and ingredient dislikes. Every suggestion is tailored to your needs.
features.foodDrinks.title: Food & Drinks
features.foodDrinks.description: Not just meals. Switch to drinks mode and get cocktail and beverage recipes from the same chef friends.
meetTheChefs.label: Meet the Chefs
meetTheChefs.title: 8 cuisines,
meetTheChefs.subtitle: Each chef is an expert in their culinary tradition. They know the authentic techniques, the secret ingredients, and the stories behind every dish.
meetTheChefs.greeting.pepe: Ciao! Let me show you how nonna used to make it.
meetTheChefs.greeting.yuki: Konnichiwa! Precision is the soul of Japanese cooking.
meetTheChefs.greeting.carlos: Hola amigo! Ready to add some spice to your life?
meetTheChefs.greeting.priya: Namaste! Let me teach you the art of spices.
meetTheChefs.greeting.jacques: Bonjour! Cooking is an art, and I am here to guide you.
meetTheChefs.greeting.somchai: Sawasdee! Balance is everything — sweet, sour, salty, spicy.
meetTheChefs.greeting.renata: Oi! Let's bring some Brazilian warmth to your kitchen!
meetTheChefs.greeting.joan: Hola! Spain is all about sharing food and good moments.
appShowcase.label: The App
appShowcase.title: See it
appShowcase.subtitle: From picking your chef to plating the final dish. Here's what cooking with Chefriends looks like.
appShowcase.phone.pickChef: Pick a chef friend to cook with today
appShowcase.phone.recipe1.title: Lemon Herb Roast Chicken
appShowcase.phone.recipe1.description: Classic roasted chicken with bright lemon and fresh rosemary.
appShowcase.phone.recipe2.title: Garlic Chicken Risotto
appShowcase.phone.recipe2.description: Creamy risotto with tender chicken and aromatic garlic.
appShowcase.phone.instruction: Place the chicken in a roasting pan, rub with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Stuff the cavity with lemon halves and rosemary sprigs.
appShowcase.phone.tipText: Let the chicken come to room temperature for 30 minutes before roasting — it cooks more evenly!
appShowcase.step1.label: Step 1
appShowcase.step1.title: Pick a Chef
appShowcase.step1.description: Choose the cuisine you're craving. Each chef brings their own authentic style.
appShowcase.step2.label: Step 2
appShowcase.step2.title: Get Recipes
appShowcase.step2.description: Your chef suggests recipes based on what you have. Refresh for new ideas.
appShowcase.step3.label: Step 3
appShowcase.step3.title: Cook Step by Step
appShowcase.step3.description: Swipe through instructions with chef tips, timers, and ingredient scaling.
howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: From fridge to plate
howItWorks.subtitle: No meal planning, no recipe searching. Just open the app, show what you have, and start cooking.
howItWorks.step01.title: Add Ingredients
howItWorks.step01.description: Scan your fridge with the camera, upload a photo, or type what you have. The AI identifies everything instantly.
howItWorks.step02.title: Pick a Chef
howItWorks.step02.description: Choose from 8 AI chef friends, each specialized in a different cuisine. Pick the one that matches your craving.
howItWorks.step03.title: Get Recipes
howItWorks.step03.description: Your chef friend suggests personalized recipes based on your ingredients, preferences, and dietary needs.
howItWorks.step04.title: Cook Step by Step
howItWorks.step04.description: Follow clear instructions with chef tips, adjust servings, and get a shopping list for any missing ingredients.
